markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Festering Gnasher](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1839)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

A festering gnasher is a floating head covered in infectious pustules and hollowed out by decay.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Beheaded_FesteringGnasher.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Festering Gnasher](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1839)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Tiny" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 74</row>

**Perception** +8; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** -3

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +4 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +6 

</row>

**HP** 18
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Weaknesses**
[positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128) 2

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 15 feet, fly 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [reach 0 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 piercing plus brain rot

**Brain Rot**  ([Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)) **Saving Throw** DC 14 Fortitude; **Onset** 1 day; **Stage 1** [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) (3 days); **Stage 2** stupefied 2 and [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) (1 day); **Stage 3** [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28) with spasms (1 day); **Stage 4** death

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-220" />
name: Festering Gnasher
